Thank you Richard,

I am not upset or mad at anybody. After careful study a=
nd input from 
yourself, Moses, and others, I realized that I purchased thi=
s sword 
as a piece to study. It has served it's purpose and I personally 
=
love this sword. It is in excellant polish, the Koshirae is better 
than av=
erage and I will put it up on my web site as soon as I am 
able to take goo=
d pictures of it. My write up will include something 
about the missing Bos=
hi. During the Sengoku Wars, if a tip was 
broken off for whatever reason, =
repair the tip (make a new Kissaki)
and send the Samurai back to fight anot=
her day.

All is well............Thanks again,

Elliott
